__e: He was an... an alcoholic, and... my mom... kinda...
Yeah, I know he's an alcoholic too, and I know he has his own apartment.
Thing is if you're an alcoholic and you know you're an alcoholic and you don't do something about being that, you're an asshole.
So what you're saying is, basically, that Adam and I are making a mistake by not letting her date a 19-year-old recovering alcoholic that lives alone... no, no, no.
If anyone sees anything alcoholic On or around this table, hand it to me now!
He was a heavy alcoholic at the time and the only time they ever missed a show "was because of him".

I don't want to fake it anymore either, but there is no version of us breaking up that looks good for me, unless you're willing to say that I left you because you're an impotent alcoholic who hates kids and dogs and God.
I gotta tell you, that's not the kind of "holic" I thought I'd be.
It was because he was a drunk who couldn't stand his life with you any longer.
